title: Should we pray Eclipse Prayer without seeing it with the naked eye?
transcript: if we do not see the eclipse we do not react meaning if the astronomers told us that today at nine o'clock p.m there will be a full eclipse of the moon and all of the scientists agreed on this we believe them ten minutes to nine we look up and the sky is filled with clouds we are unable to see the moon how many rakaats do we pray none we pray nothing why because the eclipse to us did not take place although the scientists say it's taking place now you
